name: Basic Minecraft
description:
This is a basic version of Minecraft. No zombies, no day cycle, no weather, and only 4 types of blocks. And YUP!!!Its under development and you can face some lag on destroying blocks or placing blocks.

The controls are simple

•  W to Move Forward

•  A to Move Left

•  D to Move Right

•  S to Move Backward

•  E to open Crafting recipe

•  Right Click to Place Blocks

•  Left Click to Break Blocks

•  Space Bar to Jump

•  1-7 numbers to  Select a hotbar item

*Note:  Hotbar is   the place where collected blocks or items are  shown

Features

•  keyboard/mouse support

•  Support Windows  7/8/10/11

•  Singleplayer

Download Instructions

•  Download the file

•  Unzip it

•  Open the file and Search for 'Main Game Icon'

•  Create its shortcut on the desktop for easy access

•  Open it

•  Enjoy...

Game info

Version:     1.0

Size(zip):     19.6MB

Size(expanded):     61.6MB

RAM Required:     1GB or more

RAM recommended:     2GB or more

Author:     Yash Raj

Published on:     1 May 2022

Game Permissions

Nope, no permissions are required....

The game is also free, And one more thing, YES.... this game is also inspired by Minecraft. Well, as this game is free   you can easy download by reading download instructions above. You can also tell me about the bug and glitches below in the comment section below. 

Note: This game is under development stage so, don't judge. Well, the released version will come later in future. Till then Enjoy...;)<3
